about_the_game:
Tails Noir: Rebel Rush - Soundtrack is the crazy Drum and Bass, Breakcore and Garage stuff you listened to while playing the game!
Brought to you by the same artist who created the Tails Noir Original Soundtrack, Danshin.

Contains both MP3 and WAV files. Some of the tracks are extended comparing to the in-game music, in case you are really into DJing.
